errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.
errors.forbidden: Access to this resource is forbidden.
errors.validationError: There was an error with the data validation. Please check your input and try again.
errors.timeoutError: The request timed out. Please try again later.
errors.internalServerError: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.formSubmissionError: There was an error submitting the form. Please try again.

messages.userCreated: A new user account has been created. Please verify the details and ensure correct setup.
messages.userEnabled: Your account has been enabled. You can now log in.
messages.userUpdated: Your profile has been updated successfully.
messages.userUpdateFailed: Failed to update your profile. Please try again later.
messages.userProfileAccessDenied: Access to the user’s profile is restricted. It is set to private.
messages.userProfileViewRequested: The public profile was successfully accessed.
messages.tokenBalanceUpdated: Your token balance has been updated.
messages.tokenBalanceInsufficient: You do not have enough tokens for this action.
messages.tokensCredited: Tokens have been credited to your account.
messages.tokensWithdrawn: Tokens have been withdrawn from your account.
messages.resumeCreated: Your resume has been created successfully.
messages.resumeNotFound: The resume could not be found.
messages.resumeDownloadFailed: Failed to download your resume. Please try again.
messages.resumeDeserializeError: There was an error processing your resume data.
messages.coverLetterCreated: Your cover letter has been created.
messages.coverLetterDownloaded: Your cover letter has been downloaded.
messages.coverLetterUpdated: Your cover letter has been updated.
messages.coverLetterNotFound: The cover letter could not be found.
messages.coverLetterDownloadFailed: Failed to download your cover letter.
messages.tokenExpired: Your verification token has expired. Your account has been deleted.
messages.userNotFoundInvalidToken: The user could not be found. The token may be invalid.
messages.recaptchaVerificationFailed: Recaptcha verification failed. Please try again.
messages.passwordVerificationFailed: Password verification failed. Please check your password and try again.
messages.passwordResetCompleted: Password reset has been successfully completed.
messages.emailSent: The email has been sent successfully.
messages.sendingPasswordResetErrorEmail: Sending error email for password reset...
messages.emailSendFailed: Failed to send email. Please check the recipient's address and try again.
messages.fileUploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again.
messages.invalidFileType: The file type is not supported.
messages.emptyFile: The file is empty. Please upload a valid file.
messages.fileParseError: Failed to parse the file content. Please check the file format.
messages.geminiMessageSendFailed: Failed to send message to Gemini. Please try again.
messages.geminiSessionClosed: The Gemini chat session has been closed.
messages.resumeSaveUnauthenticatedUser: Failed to save resume. You need to be logged in.
messages.tokenUsageAfterClose: Tokens were used after the session closed.
messages.functionCallError: Error calling the function. Please contact support.
messages.resumeRequired: It looks like you don't have a resume saved on JobBot yet. Please create a new resume or upload an existing one first.
messages.resumeSaveSuccessful: Your resume has been saved successfully.
messages.resumeSaveFailed: Failed to save your resume. Please try again.
messages.resumeParsingFailed: Failed to parse the resume. Please ensure the resume format is correct.
messages.coverLetterSaveSuccess: Your cover letter has been saved successfully.
messages.coverLetterSaveFailed: Failed to save your cover letter. Please try again.
messages.newWebSocketConnection: A new connection has been established.
messages.webSocketConnectionCloseReason: The connection was closed due to:
messages.webSocketAuthFailed: Authentication failed. Please log in again.
messages.pdfCreationFailed: Failed to create PDF. Please try again.
messages.pdfCreationException: An error occurred while creating the PDF. Please contact support.

signup.title: Create an account
signup.pwdCaseReq: At least one upper case letter
signup.checkboxLegal: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the terms and conditions.
signup.checkboxNewsletter: I would like to receive newsletters and updates.

cookieBanner.heading: Cookies from grandma? 🍪
cookieBanner.textPart1: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website and to analyze the use of the website. Some cookies are essential to ensure basic functions, while others help us analyze and optimize the website and your user experience. By clicking
cookieBanner.textPart2: you agree to the use of all cookies, including tracking cookies such as Google Analytics. If you click
cookieBanner.textPart3: we will only use essential cookies.

popup.heading: Important Update Available
popup.text: We have an important update regarding our privacy policy. Please take a moment to review the new changes and how they may affect your use of our services. The updated policy will take effect on July 1, 2024. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

welcomeHint.text: Hi, I'm JobBot, your personal assistant for job applications. My goal is to assist you at every step of your application journey. Whether you're searching for job openings, looking to optimize your resume, or need help creating a cover letter – I'm here to help you. Let's work together to achieve your career goals!

video.cookies: To view this video, all cookies must be accepted. Please refresh the page after accepting them.

chat.successResume: Your resume has been successfully saved! You can view, edit, and download it in your profile.
chat.successCoverLetter: Your cover letter has been successfully saved! You can view and download it in your profile.
chat.feedback: I hope I was able to help you! To make JobBot even better, we would really appreciate your feedback. Please take 2-3 minutes to complete our short survey. :)
chat.donation: If you would like to support JobBot financially, you can donate any amount here. :)

workExperienceForm.name: Add Work Experience
workExperienceForm.bulletListPlaceholder: Add tasks and responsibilities, each separated by a new line.

educationForm.name: Add Education
educationForm.bulletListPlaceholder: Add activities and achievements, each separated by a new line.

personalProjectsForm.name: Add Personal Project
personalProjectsForm.bulletListPlaceholder: Add activities and responsibilities, each separated by a new line.

additionalExperienceForm.name: Add Additional Experience
additionalExperienceForm.bulletListPlaceholder: Add details, each separated by a new line.

awardsForm.name: Add Award
awardsForm.bulletListPlaceholder: Add details, each separated by a new line.

certificationsForm.name: Add Certification
certificationsForm.bulletListPlaceholder: Add details, each separated by a new line.

resume.name: Tailor Your Resume to a Specific Job
resume.jobDescriptionPlaceholder: Please paste the job description here.

coverletter.name: Tailor Your Cover Letter to a Specific Job
coverletter.jobDescriptionPlaceholder: Please paste the job description here.

resume.name: Select the Language of Your Resume

coverletter.name: Select the Language of Your Cover Letter

resumePrompts.startChat: Hi, I would like to create a new resume.
resumePrompts.selectLanguage: I want to create my resume in {}.
resumePrompts.tailorToJobPosting: Please tailor my resume for this company and position:
resumePrompts.genericResume: I do not want to tailor this resume to a specific job description.
resumePrompts.selectBulletPoints: Thank you, I have selected and customized these bullet points. Please save them in my resume:
resumePrompts.addToResumeAndSuggestBulletPoints: Please add these {} to my resume and suggest appropriate bullet points:
resumePrompts.addPrompt: Your response must contain a JSON array with appropriate bullet points. Do not include any markdown in your response.
resumePrompts.addToResume: Please add these {} to my resume:
resumePrompts.saveResume: Thank you for your help. Now take a moment and consider the entire chat history. I am finished and would like to save my resume now.
resumePrompts.savePrompt: Save the resume by using the function: save_resume. Do not send any other message. I do not need to see or confirm the resume again. Just save it by using Function Calling.

coverLetterPrompts.startChat: Hi, I would like to create a new cover letter.
coverLetterPrompts.selectLanguage: I want to create my cover letter in {}.
coverLetterPrompts.tailorToJobPosting: Please tailor my cover letter for this company and position:
coverLetterPrompts.genericResume: I do not want to tailor this cover letter to a specific job description.
coverLetterPrompts.saveCoverLetter: Thank you for your help. I am finished and would like to save my cover letter now.
coverLetterPrompts.savePrompt: Save the cover letter by using the function: save_cover_letter. Do not send any other message. I do not need to see or confirm the cover letter again. Just save it by using Function Calling.
